abstract: The companies said that they were back at the bargaining table to try to settle litigation related to their proposed merger, sending their shares up.
snippet: The companies said that they were back at the bargaining table to try to settle litigation related to their proposed merger, sending their shares up.
lead_paragraph: Dow Chemical and Rohm & Haas said Friday that they were in discussions about their disputed $15 billion merger, sending shares of both companies sharply higher as investors bet the two sides would work out a deal over the weekend.

headline.main: Dow Chemical and Rohm & Haas Hold Talks to Settle Merger Suit
headline.print_headline: Dow Chemical and Rohm & Haas Hold Talks to Settle Merger Suit
